system.description:
When you select this archetype at level 1, the damage dealt by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.t4fBlBaiSejL8KVX]{Sanguine Transference} is radiant damage.

Additionally, choose one of the following:

Redirect Malice

When you hit an enemy creature with a melee weapon attack, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than you until the start of your next turn. You may use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per short or long rest.

Invigorating Touch

As a bonus action, you reach out and touch a creature that you can see (this creature can be yourself). The target regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your Constitution modifier. You may use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.
